title: Game freezes for 1-2 seconds (sometimes less) every few minutes
body:
Hello, this only happens in some games (talking about LoL here). There are a few games (LoL) where I don't freeze at all, and then other games where I will freeze every few minutes or so. I looked in my logs, and it says "Data error on expression" and also "Failed to load textures" could I be freezing because of my graphics card or could it be my internet? I run on a wireless connection, but when I freeze in game...everything else on my connection will be fine. I am on a pretty crappy laptop as well. Hp Pavilion g7 with an intel I3 and a crap integrated graphics card.

The "cannot open file" literally happens like a billion times. I don't know how to post my whole log. 

> 000026.664|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "characters/sru_blue/skins/base/animations/sru_blue_idle_lookat_l.anm" because it's not in the manifest.
000026.664|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "characters/sru_blue/skins/base/animations/sru_blue_idle_lookat_m.anm" because it's not in the manifest.
000026.664|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "characters/sru_blue/skins/base/animations/sru_blue_idle_lookat_r.anm" because it's not in the manifest.
000026.956|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Characters/sru_camprespawnmarker/sru_camprespawnmarker.bin" because it's not in the manifest.
000026.973|  ERROR| Can not open file  *********
000026.973|  ERROR| Failed to load VoidGate_base_TX_CM.DDS
000026.973|   WARN| r3dTexture EX: VoidGate_base_TX_CM.DDS - not found. Dummy texture created.
000026.973|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "characters/sru_camprespawnmarker/skins/base/animations/idle1.anm" because it's not in the manifest.
000027.031|  ERROR| Data Error on expression: always
 Data Error message: Missing effect texture 

000027.050|  ERROR| Data Error on expression: always
 Data Error message: Missing effect texture 

000027.050|  ERROR| Data Error on expression: always
 Data Error message: Missing effect texture 

000027.050|  ERROR| Data Error on expression: always
 Data Error message: Missing effect texture 

000027.050|  ERROR| Data Error on expression: always
 Data Error message: Missing effect texture

replies.body:
Feezing in-game can be caused by a plethora of different factors. Your logs indicate that there may be an issue with your League installation, but a good starting point in troubleshooting this is to work through our [FPS guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) It goes over the most common solutions for brief freezes in-game.

If you continue to see issues after taking the steps in that guide,  please let me know.
